messages.message: Urgent help needed in flood-affected area. Send rescue teams ASAP.
Airborne rescue requested in landslide-hit region. Multiple casualties reported.
Requesting medical supplies for earthquake-affected areas. Medical assistance urgently needed.
Rescue operation underway in cyclone-affected coastal areas. Additional boats required.
Fire outbreak in a residential area. Need more fire tenders and personnel.
Security assistance needed during flood relief operations. Situation critical.
Seeking medical professionals for providing aid in a disease outbreak. Hospitals overwhelmed.
Urgently need blood donations for accident victims. Blood banks running low.
